div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:

name.value: Universitätsmedizin Greifswald

valueMarkdown.value: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

name.value: Abdominal Positioning

description.value: In ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg, abdominal positioning should be consistently performed, with an abdominal positioning interval of at least 16 hours.

name.value: Abdominal positioning for ventilated patients with ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg

description.value: Abdominal positioning for ventilated patients with ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg

name.value: Abdominal positioning plan in case of ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg

description.value: In ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg, abdominal positioning should be consistently performed, with an abdominal positioning interval of at least 16 hours.

name.value: Anticoagulation Plan for hospitalized intensive-care COVID-19 patients with no specific indication

description.value: In intensive care patients without a specific indication (e.g. pulmonary embolism), therapeutic anticoagulation should not be given.

name.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Certoparin

description.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Certoparin in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (in absence of contraindications for LWMH)

name.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Dalteparin

description.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Dalteparin in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (in absence of contraindications for LWMH)

name.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Enoxaparin

name.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux

description.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux in hospitalised COVID-19 patients

name.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux

description.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Fondaparinux in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (when contraindications for LWMH exist)

name.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with LWMH

description.value: Hospitalized patients with COVID-19 should receive standard drug thromboembolism prophylaxis with low molecular weight heparin in the absence of contraindications. Alternatively, fondaparinux may be used.

name.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Nadroparin

description.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Nadroparin in hospitalised COVID-19 patients (in absence of contraindications for LWMH)

name.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Tinzaparin

description.value: Antithrombotic prophylaxis with Tinzaparin in hospitalised COVID-19 patients
Concepts required in recommendations that are not defined elsewhere

name.value: Therapeutic anticoagulation in non-intensive care, high-risk COVID-19 patients

description.value: Therapeutic anticoagulation in non-intensive care, high-risk COVID-19 patients

name.value: Therapeutic Anticoagulation Plan (hospitalised, non-intensive care, COVID-19 patients with no renal function impairment (eGFR >= 30ml/min))

description.value: In hospitalized, non-intensive care patients with COVID-19 and increased risk (e.g., D-dimers ≥ 2 mg/l), therapeutic anticoagulation can be considered if the risk of bleeding is low. Anticoagulation, preferentially with NMH or UFH, can be considered.

name.value: Tidal volume / end-inspiratory airway pressure for ventilated COVID-19 patients with ARDS

description.value: Tidal volume / end-inspiratory airway pressure for ventilated COVID-19 patients with ARDS

name.value: Tidal volume for ventilated patients with ARDS

description.value: Tidal volume for ventilated patients with ARDS

name.value: Ventilation Plan for COVID-19 patients with ARDS

description.value: In ventilated patients with COVID-19 and ARDS, tidal volume should be ≤ 6 ml/kg standard body weight, end-inspiratory airway pressure ≤ 30 cm H2O.

name.value: Ventilation Plan for patients with ARDS

description.value: We recommend ventilating patients with ARDS with a VT ≤ 6 ml/kg standard body weight (bw). (Table 1, Appendix)
